description: Takes sample input and output documents and uses Amazon Bedrock to generate a mapping automatically. Depending on the accuracy and other factors, you can then edit the mapping for your needs.

parameters.name: inputFileContent
parameters.description: Provide the contents of a sample X12 EDI file (for inbound EDI) or JSON/XML file (for outbound EDI) to use as a starting point for the mapping.

parameters.name: outputFileContent
parameters.description: Provide the contents of a sample X12 EDI file (for outbound EDI) or JSON/XML file (for inbound EDI) to use as a target for the mapping.

parameters.name: mappingType
parameters.description: Specify the mapping type: either JSONATA or XSLT.

nested_items.name: mappingTemplate
nested_items.description: Returns a mapping template based on your inputs.

nested_items.name: mappingAccuracy
nested_items.description: Returns a percentage that estimates the accuracy of the generated mapping.
